prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Papers of Rockwell Kent, Accession #6335-b , Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was given to the Library on [17 Dec 1963] 29 Jan 1965.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of 2 letters from Rockwell Kent to Mrs. Gilchrist commenting on possible moral objections to speakers from the Rand school and remarking that he will miss her luncheon and Lindsay's talk.

did.unittitle: Rockwell Kent to Mrs. Gilchrist 1920 Jul 17

scopecontent.p: Comments on possible moral objections to speakers from the Rand school.

did.unittitle: R. K. to Mrs. Gilchrist 1921 Apr 6

scopecontent.p: Will miss her luncheon and Lindsay's talk.
